text: Rex Taylor Reed (born October 2, 1938) is an American movie critic, journalist, actor, and was the co-host for At the Movies. He worked for the New York Observer. He appeared as himself in the 1978 movie Superman. Reed was born on October 2, 1938 in Fort Worth, Texas. He was raised in New York City, New York. He now lives in Manhattan, New York City, New York. He was good friends with Liz Smith.Tribune Media Services via Buffalo News, June 9, 2006 ==References== ==Other websites== * Rex Reed's New York Observer movie review archive * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television personalities Category:American journalists Category:American movie critics Category:Writers from Texas Category:Writers from New York City Category:Actors from Fort Worth, Texas Category:Actors from New York City
title: Rex Reed
